parameters: \N<Segi>This place is...

\N<Segi>Ugh... What is that? There's definitely a nasty smell that's
getting to my nose. And the air here feels tense, like it's
pricking my skin...

\N<Segi>...If I hadn't taken that antidote earlier, the poisonous
air and the pressure would have knocked me out in no time...
\N<Segi>But... I'm fine. The antidote is working...
\N<Segi>The Ryuda... they really do have superior technology.

\N<Segi>That's right... Rozaro-san mentioned it too. The Ryuda's
technology made it possible to explore the interior of these
ruins.

\N<Segi>...Now's not the time to be impressed. What I need to do now
isn't to stand still.
\N<Segi>I must move forward... and become stronger.
A
showHpGauge
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]
About the Lake Mybe Ruins
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

There are apparitions within the ruins that are enemies to
Segi, but even if she gets hurt by contact, it will not
result in a game over.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

However, if she is wounded and collapses, some kind of
danger may befall her.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

Additionally, among the enemies that roam and the contents
of treasure chests, there are individuals with special
colors.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

These individuals, while random, generally offer better
rewards compared to those of normal color.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

Apart from certain special events, Segi can only increase
her abilities by using the growth agents placed within the
ruins.
\C[1]【Information】\C[0]

For this reason, we recommend actively acquiring the items
that are placed throughout.
showHpGauge
